structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
SHERIFFS, CONSTABLES, AND COUNTY POLICE FORCE

law.catch_line: Mobile radio communication equipment for sheriffs and deputies.
law.text: The fiscal court of any county may purchase mobile radio communication equipment for the use of the sheriff and deputies of that county if it deems the purchase of such equipment to be to the best interest of the county, considering the county finances and other permissible expenditures.
law.history: Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 59, sec. 1, effective June 17, 1954.
